DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVE : To find effectiveness early application physical therapy prevention lymphedema breast surgery lymphadenectomy . DESIGN : Randomized , control single blind clinical trial . Three year duration . Patients randomly assign one group : Experimental group : Early physical therapy + training mean prevention ; Control group : training mean prevention . In group several physical therapy assessment undertaken : 1st surgery ; 2nd immediately surgery ; 3rd complete intervention ; 4th , 5th 6th 3 , 6 , 12 24 month . SUBJECTS : Women breast cancer treat breast surgery include lymphadenectomy Principe de Asturias Hospital , provide contraindication physical therapy , reading , understand freely sign inform consent form . SAMPLE SIZE : A total 116 subject include study ( 58 subject group ) , assume 15 % drop-outs least 20 % reduction , statistical power 60 % . DATA ANALYSIS : To find effectiveness intervention compare rate lymphedema group mean logistic regression analysis , main factor intervention group . Other factor aim control effect intervention also include . In order compare rate appearance lymphedema group , survival analysis also include .
